duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead and supervise a group of 8-10 Area Leaders with responsibility for 100 – 150 stores.
Provide assistance and guidance to Area Leaders and Store Operators in daily store operations to maximize sales and gross profit.
Act as a change agent to drive business growth and evolving business operations.
Oversee staffing, training, and supervision of Area Leaders.
Travel within the assigned region with approximately 25% of time spent on overnight travel.
Relocate as needed for the role.
Utilize multi-unit management experience for both company-owned and franchise operations.
Utilize retail industry and merchandising expertise, especially in the C-Store and foodservice industries.
Manage P&L responsibility for the assigned area of stores.
Possess strong strategic planning and business development skills.
Work with small box (100-150 stores) or big box (15-50 stores) business models.

education_certification.credential: BS/BA degree with an MBA preferred
